name: CoronaryArteryDiseaseCAD_CPT
title: Coronary Artery Disease (CAD)_CPT
description: b.well created value set by Sr. Clinical Business Analyst for CAD Condition.
purpose: (Clinical Focus: The intent of this value set is for the purpose of defining the clinical codes that constitute CAD Condition for inclusion and utilization in patients/users connected heath.),(Data Element Scope: CAD Condition for b.well.),(Inclusion Criteria: CAD ICD9 Codes that constitute the CAB Condition for b.well.),(Exclusion Criteria: N/A)

concept.display: Anesthesia for direct coronary artery bypass grafting; without pump oxygenator
Anesthesia for direct coronary artery bypass grafting; with pump oxygenator

Cardiology (coronary artery disease [CAD]), analysis of 3 proteins (high sensitivity [hs] troponin, adiponectin, and kidney injury molecule-1 [KIM-1]), plasma, algorithm reported as a risk score for obstructive CAD

Transcatheter intracoronary infusion of supersaturated oxygen in conjunction with percutaneous coronary revascularization during acute myocardial infarction, including catheter placement, imaging guidance (eg, fluoroscopy), angiography, and radiologic supervision and interpretation
Venous Grafting Only for Coronary Artery Bypass
Coronary artery bypass, vein only
Coronary artery bypass, using venous graft(s) and arterial graft(s)

Anesthesia for direct coronary artery bypass grafting
Percutaneous transluminal coronary angioplasty

contains.display: Anesthesia for direct coronary artery bypass grafting; without pump oxygenator
Anesthesia for direct coronary artery bypass grafting; with pump oxygenator

Cardiology (coronary artery disease [CAD]), analysis of 3 proteins (high sensitivity [hs] troponin, adiponectin, and kidney injury molecule-1 [KIM-1]) with 3 clinical parameters (age, sex, history of cardiac intervention), plasma, algorithm reported as a risk score for obstructive CAD
